title: Resources — POLET
text: Resources - Interactive visualisations Historical deployment of wind and solar power, fitted growth models and their parameters for Nature Energy article on National growth dynamics of wind and solar power. - Code for renewables growth Code for fitting growth model and replicating a computational experiment on growth metrics and functions for Nature Energy article on National growth dynamics of wind and solar power. - Code for avoided emissions Code for calculating avoided emissions from coal phase-out for Nature Communications article “Compensation affected actors necessary for rapid coal phase-out but expensive if extended to major emitters”
